meta.title: How to make an IoT water level monitor | Pablo Cruz
meta.ogTitle: How to make an IoT water level monitor
meta.description: This post explains how I made an IoT water level monitor using a raspberry pi, an ESP32 or ESP8266 and an ultrasonic sensor.
